Used for a low-pass filter in YM2149 emulation in Steem SSE.
There's no 'shelf' filter, so we still need other code for Microwire emulation.
It is a Linux project, so some minor changes were done to include it in Steem SSE.
We only use the files we need, for the complete archive see:
http://www.cardinalpeak.com/blog?p=1841
